patterns_discovered.testing_pattern: Tests follow Arrange-Act-Assert structure similar to scaffolder.test.ts with describe() blocks and specific test filters
patterns_discovered.session_management: Auto-Claude maintains session-based development with progressive subtask completion
patterns_discovered.commit_pattern: Each subtask completion results in a dedicated commit with descriptive messages
patterns_discovered.build_workflow: Three-phase workflow: dependency installation → build → type checking with bun toolchain
patterns_discovered.configuration_validation: Uses Zod v4 schema validation with safeParse() returning error issues array
patterns_discovered.security_model: Command-based security with separate base, stack, script, and custom command categories

gotchas_discovered.test_filtering: Tests must use specific filters like '--test-filter "valid config"' to run appropriate test subsets
gotchas_discovered.type_check_warnings: Type check warnings are non-blocking and don't prevent project continuation
gotchas_discovered.progressive_completion: Subtasks must be completed sequentially as they depend on previous phase completions
gotchas_discovered.security_command_lists: Security configuration requires explicit command whitelisting in different categories
gotchas_discovered.status_tracking: .auto-claude-status file must be maintained for accurate project state tracking
